We ensure that our customers receive their goods promptly

landing_page.about.text: Lokabees - the initiative for a colorful neighborhood and the digitization of local retail. The team consists of around 20 committed specialists from the areas of development, UX design, marketing and business development as well as numerous other supporters who work together on lokabees.
landing_page.about.title: About Lokabees
landing_page.contact.text: Stay updated for new features, new shops, local updates and more with our newsletter!
landing_page.contact.title: Let's stay in contact
landing_page.shop_list.no_shops: We have not found any shops in this area :-( Feel free to ask local shop owners to register their shop on lokabees.
